credit_total.title: Credit Total
credit_total.description: The sum credit amount of the ledger.

credit_amount.title: Credit Amount
credit_amount.description: The credit amount of the line entry.

date.title: Date
date.description: The date that the line entry occurred.

ledgers.title: Ledgers
ledgers.description: A list of ledgers that are included in this chart of accounts.

total_ledgers.title: Total Ledgers
total_ledgers.description: A list of total ledgers that are included in this chart of accounts.

date.title: Date
date.description: Date that the journal entry occurred

updated_line_entries.title: Updated Line Entries
updated_line_entries.description: A map containing the journal entry id as     the key and object with the updated parameters as the value

debit_credit.description: Debit or credit amount is interpreted as a positive value.

user_editable.title: User Editable
user_editable.description: Indicates whether line entries in this ledger may be edited by the user.

is_required.title: Is Required
is_required.description: Indicates whether this ledger is required to exist for the user.

start_date.title: Start Date
start_date.description: The inclusive start date of the statement.

end_date.title: End Date
end_date.description: The inclusive end date of the statement.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of this statement's ledger.

debit_credit.description: Debit or credit amount is interpreted as a positive value

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The sum of line entry amounts in the statement for the statement period.

opening_balance.title: Opening Balance
opening_balance.description: The balance just before the statement period.

closing_balance.title: Closing Balance
closing_balance.description: The balance at the end of the statement period.

ledger_id.title: Ledger Id
ledger_id.description: If this summary represents a total of multiple ledgers,                                   this value will be null.

debit_credit.description: Debit or credit amount is interpreted as a positive value

user_editable.title: User Editable
user_editable.description: Indicates whether this ledger may be edited by the user.

is_cash.title: Is Cash
is_cash.description: Indicates whether this ledger is a cashflow ledger.

is_required.title: Is Required
is_required.description: Indicates whether this ledger is required to exist in the template.

user_editable.title: User Editable
user_editable.description: Indicates whether this line entry may be edited by the user.

date.title: Date
date.description: The date that the line entry occurred.

sort_code.title: Sort Code
sort_code.description: The sort code. This determines the display order in reports.

start_code.title: Start Code
start_code.description: The sort code that specifies the start of the range of ledgers to include in the total.

end_code.title: End Code
end_code.description: The sort code that specifies the end of the range of ledgers to include in the total.

debit_credit.description: Debit or credit amount is interpreted as a positive value.
